comment:
First generation WLP090 reached final gravity in three days. 
Cold crashed two days at 40°F.
on Day Five, 5 gallons were kegged for dry-hopping; 10 days.
The remaining 1.5gal was put in a short corny and pressurized at 12psi at 38°F for two days. Drinks wonderfully: Grain to Glass in Seven Days.
